UNITS.title: Auroville Consulting
UNITS.description: Using our expertise in ecological and socially responsible development, we work for a prosperous eco-system that supports all life on this planet.Our approach is multi-faceted: We collaborate with academic, private and public sector partners both in India and Internationally, helping to develop sustainable urban and industrial development policies, ecologically friendly technologies â€“ and the minds of future leaders.

UNITS.title: AGP | Workshops
UNITS.description: Auroville Green Practices aims to bring together various stakeholders to envision future townships that offer a habitat that is ecologically, socially and economically nurturing. Distinguished professionals in the field share their vision and experiences in the form of plenary talks, participatory sessions and a panel discussion addressing the key question concerning sustainably integrated human habitats.

UNITS.title: Auroville Retreat
UNITS.description: Auroville Retreat hosts programs that are designed to nurture your body, mind & soul. Through a variety of mediums, our facilitators take you on a journey to inspire a harmonious blend between your body and mind. With practice, exploration, and a deepened sense of awareness, your experiences transform you, and grant you a renewed vitality to apply to your professional and personal life.

UNITS.title: Auroville Collaborative
UNITS.description: Auroville Collaborative aims to communicate the collective expression of Auroville through media, events and design. We facilitate collaboration between units of Auroville, its residents and volunteers from around the world.

UNITS.title: Center For Green Practices
UNITS.description: Auroville dreams of creating a centre of excellence in sustainable development. It would conduct research and teach - and help change lives. The Centre for Green Practices: Help make it a reality.

UNITS.title: Auroville Green Practices
UNITS.description: Auroville Green Practices Portal is a knowledge resource of integrated green practices in Auroville. It is meant for all those everywhere in the world who want to participate in our efforts at putting into practice a vision of environmentally-responsible living.
